Sentencas: The structural, microstructural, dielectric, and conductivity properties of Tin modified Sodium Bismuth Titanate (Na0.5Bi0.5)(Ti1-xSnx)O3, where x (mol%) = 0%, 1%, 3% (labeled as NBT, NBTS1, and NBTS3, respectively) were experimentally investigated in this paper.
Titulo: Optimisation of electrical conductivity and dielectric properties of Sn4+-doped (Na0.5Bi0.5)TiO3 perovskite

Sentencas: In this regard, the solid-state reaction process was used to prepare polycrystalline materials, where sintering was performed at 1100 degrees C for 3 h under atmospheric air.
Titulo: Optimisation of electrical conductivity and dielectric properties of Sn4+-doped (Na0.5Bi0.5)TiO3 perovskite

Sentencas: As a result, Xray diffraction confirms, as it seems, the presence of a rhombohedral phase (R3c) in all compositions at room temperature.
Titulo: Optimisation of electrical conductivity and dielectric properties of Sn4+-doped (Na0.5Bi0.5)TiO3 perovskite

Sentencas: The electrical properties of the compositions are also studied using complex impedance spectroscopy (CIS).
Titulo: Optimisation of electrical conductivity and dielectric properties of Sn4+-doped (Na0.5Bi0.5)TiO3 perovskite

Sentencas: Subsequently, at room-temperature, doping 1% of Sn4+ in the NBT perovskite reduces the dielectric loss from 4.4 x 10-2 to 3.43 x 10-2 at 1 MHz.
Titulo: Optimisation of electrical conductivity and dielectric properties of Sn4+-doped (Na0.5Bi0.5)TiO3 perovskite

Sentencas: Moreover, it is around 3.05 x 10-2 at 93.6 degrees C and 1 MHz for NBTS3.
Titulo: Optimisation of electrical conductivity and dielectric properties of Sn4+-doped (Na0.5Bi0.5)TiO3 perovskite

Sentencas: Sn4+ significantly doping improved electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Optimisation of electrical conductivity and dielectric properties of Sn4+-doped (Na0.5Bi0.5)TiO3 perovskite

Sentencas: Therefore, at 10 Hz and 450 degrees C, the electrical conductivity of NBTS3 (sigma ac = 8.76 x 10-3 S.m- 1) is 61.26 times that of pure NBT (sigma ac = 1.43 x 10-4 S.m- 1).
Titulo: Optimisation of electrical conductivity and dielectric properties of Sn4+-doped (Na0.5Bi0.5)TiO3 perovskite

Sentencas: Joncher's power law investigates the conduction mechanism's nature; (i) the decreasing variation of the exponent s1 with temperature suggests that the NBT compound is characterized by the CBH (Correlated Barrier Hopping) model.
Titulo: Optimisation of electrical conductivity and dielectric properties of Sn4+-doped (Na0.5Bi0.5)TiO3 perovskite

Sentencas: On the other hand, for NBTS1 and NBTS3 (ii), the increase in s1 and s2 parameters under temperature indicates that the NSPT (non-overlapping small polaron tunneling) model is the most dominant.
Titulo: Optimisation of electrical conductivity and dielectric properties of Sn4+-doped (Na0.5Bi0.5)TiO3 perovskite

Sentencas: In this work, all tested compounds exhibit a sort of ferroelectric relaxation behavior.
Titulo: Optimisation of electrical conductivity and dielectric properties of Sn4+-doped (Na0.5Bi0.5)TiO3 perovskite

Sentencas: Our results demonstrate that doped materials can be applied to solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Optimisation of electrical conductivity and dielectric properties of Sn4+-doped (Na0.5Bi0.5)TiO3 perovskite
